short_summary: Seeking a Business Consultant to support the strategic implementation of a comprehensive Business Intelligence solution.
description: Health Canada is seeking a Business Consultant to support the implementation of a comprehensive Business Intelligence solution. The solution will integrate relevant data governance, data modeling, and advanced analytics approaches and tools. The consultant will also play a vital role in supporting the implementation strategy to achieve the department's goals and business interests.
full_summary:
**Business Consultant: Business Intelligence and Data Management Consultation Services for Deputy Chief Financial Officer’s Directorate**

**Procurement Reference Number:** cb-6694-64113585

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Type of Procurement:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

**Description:** The Public Health Agency of Canada requires a Business Consultant to support the strategic implementation of a comprehensive Business Intelligence solution for multiple internal stakeholders. The consultant will play a vital role in supporting the implementation strategy to achieve the Deputy Chief Financial Officer's goals and business interests.

**Scope of Work:**

* Provide business intelligence consulting services to support the development and implementation of a comprehensive Business Intelligence solution
* Conduct data governance, data modeling, and advanced analytics
* Identify gaps and conduct investigations into emerging technologies as required
* Support the implementation strategy to achieve the Deputy Chief Financial Officer's goals and business interests
* Provide results reporting within the Business Intelligence strategy

**Security Requirements:**

* Common PS SRCL #22 applies
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Facility Security Clearance - Secret
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret
* Document Safeguarding Required: Secret

**Selection Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contracting Entity:**

* Health Canada

**Tender Documents:**

* Please refer to the tender description or tender documents for more information.

**Timeline:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-10T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-07-18
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-17

**Contact Information:**

* Matthew Gazo, matthew.gazo@hc-sc.gc.ca, 613297-6479

**Tender Notice:**

The procurement is set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. For more information on Indigenous business requirements of the Set-aside Program for Indigenous Business, refer to Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual. The tender notice can be accessed on the Canada Buy website. [link]([link redacted for brevity]) [link]([link redacted for brevity])
